JobFullDesc: Passionate about technology? Energized by business transformation? Deloitte Consulting LLP is looking for candidates with outstanding leadership experience, strong academic performance, and excellent communication skills to join Deloitte Consulting, LLP. Experienced Business Technology Analysts collaborate with our clients' business and IT organizations to deliver business-led, technology-enabled solutions that help enterprises adapt to their unique challenges and opportunities. Each incoming practitioner is provided with a range of project opportunities to develop their skills and interests while also building a strong foundation as a technologist and future leader at Deloitte.Work you'll doAs an Experienced Business Technology Analyst, you will be an integral member of a client service team, collaborating with diverse and talented team members to help solve meaningful business problems, improve performance, and generate value for our clients across a broad base of industries. You will have opportunities to support the implementation of technical solutions to our clients' most complex programs, ranging from standing up cloud infrastructure solutions for Fortune 500 companies, designing dashboards to enable business users to comprehend complex processes, or even developing a technology strategy to support executive-level business objectives. You can capitalize on our cross industry presence to find your niche and build your individual brand within the organization.The teamOur Enterprise Operations Consulting team plays a major role in directly embedding technology insights into our clients' organizational goals. At Deloitte, our technology consultants create sharply-focused solutions within an organization's operating model, accounting for its people, intellectual capital, technology, and processes. Engagement teams at Deloitte drive value for our clients but also understand the importance of developing resources and contributing to the communities in which we work. We make it our business to take issue to impact, both within and beyond a client setting. Learn more about our Technology Consulting practice: https://www2.deloitte.com/us/en/pages/technology/solutions/technology-consulting-offerings.html Required QualificationsFour-year degree with 3.5 GPA or higher required with 1-2 years of relevant prior experience (excluding internships)Skills: at least 12 months of experience in a consulting-related information technology position that utilizes an IT foundation. Proficiency should include at least one of the following:SAP Basis or SAP Infrastructure experienceSAP Application Development Experience - ABAP, PI/PO, CRM, SRM, BODS, Fiori, SAP Cloud Platform etc.SAP HANA ModelingBusiness Objects (visualization or data integration technologies)Data and related data solutions (MDG etc.)Experience or exposure to SAP functional solutions (SAP S/4, central finance, supply chain etc.)Travel 50% (While 50% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice.)
